0.query: fetch logs | filter outsystems.log.type  == "Integration" | filter outsystems.log.endpoint != ""  | summarize Count = count(), by: {Endpoint = outsystems.log.endpoint} | sort Count desc
0.name: Top API Endpoints by Request Count

queries.query: fetch logs | filter outsystems.log.type == "Request" | summarize Count = count(), by: {Endpoint = outsystems.api.endpoint} | sort Count desc | limit 10

1.query: fetch logs | filter outsystems.log.type == "Integration" | filter outsystems.log.endpoint != ""  | summarize AvgResponseTime = avg(toLong(outsystems.request.duration)), by: {Endpoint = outsystems.log.endpoint} | sort AvgResponseTime desc | limit 10
1.name: Average Response Time per API

queries.query: fetch logs | filter outsystems.log.type == "Request" | summarize AvgResponseTime = avg(toLong(outsystems.api.response_time)), by: {Endpoint = outsystems.api.endpoint} | sort AvgResponseTime desc | limit 10

2.query: fetch logs | filter outsystems.log.type == "Integration"  | filter outsystems.log.endpoint !="" | filter outsystems.log.error.uid !=""| summarize TotalCount = count(), by: {Endpoint = outsystems.log.endpoint}
2.name: API Error Rate

queries.query: fetch logs | filter outsystems.log.type == "Error" | summarize ErrorCount = count(), by: {Endpoint = outsystems.api.endpoint} | join (fetch logs | filter outsystems.log.type == "Request" | summarize TotalCount = count(), by: {Endpoint = outsystems.api.endpoint}) on Endpoint | fieldsAdd ErrorRate = round((ErrorCount / TotalCount) * 100, decimals:2) | sort ErrorRate desc | limit 10
